item.description: The gentle animals are part of Portland International Airport's effort to counter travel stress with soothing elements from nature.

item.title: Life Inside, Remixed: An Incarcerated Artist Learns to Paint Through the Chaos of Prison
item.description: Rafael Rodriguez’s artistic mentor and cellmate, Memo, taught him how to pour his anger and pain into oil painting.

item.title: 10 Ways to Boost Your Memory
item.description: Your risk of developing dementia increases with age. Discover simple yet effective strategies to boost cognitive function and keep your brain sharp.

item.title: Some States Are Turning Miscarriages and Stillbirths Into Criminal Cases Against Women
item.description: How a person handles a pregnancy loss — and where it occurs — can be the difference between a private medical issue and facing criminal charges.

item.title: Incarcerated Men at Sing Sing’s First Film Festival Reflect on Movies, Justice, and Change
item.description: The diverse group of jurors shared how their favorite films have shaped their perspectives on community and life behind bars.

item.description: From reproductive rights to border enforcement and marijuana legalization, voters across the nation will weigh in on criminal justice issues.
